backend/main.mo: Defines dish, nutrition, and health input types, stores recipes in a Map, and provides functions to add recipes and return filtered or customized recommendations based on allergies and favorite foods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files, describing their purpose and recent localization-related updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, icon, root element, and main script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app layout managing form state, results display, UI sections, and localized text through I18nProvider.
Image component that hides itself on load failure to prevent broken decorative assets.
frontend/src/components/DishImage.tsx: Displays dish images with error handling, fallback UI, and automatic error reset when the photo reference changes.
Form component for collecting age, weight, conditions, allergies, BP, and food preferences, then requesting recommendations. Handles validation, search-based condition entry, and mutation trigger.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Button that switches the app language between English and Spanish using the i18n context.
frontend/src/components/ResultsView.tsx: Displays health input summary and recommended dishes, including star meal detection and nutrition formatting. Provides a back button to edit inputs.
frontend/src/components/SoundtrackContro: Audio player UI with play/pause, volume, mute controls, and error handling, synced with soundtrack preference storage. Loads and manages looping background music.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Convenience hook that returns the i18n context and throws if used outside the provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, status flags, and client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutation hook for fetching food recommendations from the backend actor using provided health parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundtrackPreferen: Manages soundtrack preferences (enabled, volume, muted) with localStorage persistence and helper setters.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, translation lookup, and persistence via localStorage for the app's i18n system.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ts: Provides English and Spanish translation strings for all UI text, including form labels, results view, validation, and controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Exports a helper to safely convert bigint nutrition values to strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates health form inputs with language-specific error messages for English and Spanish.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, colors, animations, and plugins.
